refnamediv.refpurpose: convert FASTGEN ASCII databases into a format suitable for

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This program reformats FASTGEN files to a form usable by patch-g . The -D option handles type 3 components as donuts rather than triangles. The -3 option reads FASTGEN3 format files (coordinates are each 10 columns wide).

refsect1.title: DIAGNOSTICS
refsect1.para: The diagnostics are intended to be self-explanatory.
